data.name: Soda
data.line1: Indulge in the effervescent delight of refreshing soda, a tantalizing burst of fizz and flavor to uplift your senses.
data.line2_1: A refreshing companion for any occasion, adding sparkle to gatherings and moments of relaxation. Enjoy the effervescent delight of soda, a timeless beverage loved by all ages.

data.name: Juice
data.line1: Quench your thirst with nature's bounty - our vibrant selection of juices, bursting with vitamins and invigorating freshness.
data.line2_1: A nourishing choice packed with vitamins and antioxidants, perfect for a healthy lifestyle. Indulge in the invigorating freshness of juice, a delicious and revitalizing way to hydrate your body.

data.name: Water
data.line1: Experience pure hydration with our crisp, revitalizing water â€“ the ultimate refreshment to keep you feeling balanced and energized.
data.line2_1: A timeless necessity that quenches thirst and supports optimal bodily functions. Stay balanced and energized with the crisp purity of water, the ultimate refreshment for body and mind.

data.name: Beer
data.line1: Embrace the rich complexity and timeless tradition of our meticulously crafted beers, each sip a journey of flavor and camaraderie.
data.line2:
Raise Your Glass:
Why Beer is the Perfect Choice
data.line2_1: Fosters conviviality and shared moments, whether at the pub or a social gathering. Embrace the artistry and heritage behind each brew, ensuring a memorable and enjoyable experience with every sip.
